scripts.setup: npm install && if not exist C:\mongodb-data mkdir C:\mongodb-data && if not exist backend\.env echo PORT=5001>backend\.env && if not exist backend\.env echo MONGO_URI=mongodb://127.0.0.1:27017/tasksdb>>backend\.env && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npx nodemon server.js" "cd frontend && npm start"
